actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 94-1673.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the printing of the transcript of the proceedings of the Committee on Public Works and Transportation of September 21, 1976, incident to the presentation of a portrait of the Honorable Robert E. Jones to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

summary.text: Directs the printing as a House document of the transcript of proceedings of the Committee on Public Works and Transportation of September 21, 1976, incident to the presentation of a portrait of the Honorable Robert E. Jones. Stipulates that the document shall include illustrations and suitable binding and that 500 copies of the work shall be printed in addition to the usual number.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the printing of the transcript of the proceedings of the Committee on Public Works and Transportation of September 21, 1976, incident to the presentation of a portrait of the Honorable Robert E. Jones to the Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
